content: ffffrrrrooooggggggggiiiieeee ccccooooaaaasssstttteeeerrrr © 2008 samantha farrell http //on-hooks-and-needles blogspot com hook size h yarn less than 1 skein each lily sugar n cream green white and black or any other 100% cotton yarn project finished size 4 diameter not including eyes gauge not really important adjust your hook size or yarn to get the size you want pattern notes if you need more instructions on surface embellishing i would suggest checking out knit and crochet today episode 102 embellishing tips with linda cyr http //www knitandcrochettoday com/showtips/102_embellishing html pattern with green yarn chain 4 join to make ring round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 7 double_crochet in ring join to 3rd chain 8 double_crochet stitches round 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet join to third chain 16 double_crochet stitches round 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet of round join to third chain 32 double_crochet stitches round 4 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet *2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * until last double_crochet 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet join to third chain 48 double_crochet stitches fasten_off c eyes refer to photo 1 with yellow arrows and photo 1 corresponding letters with right side facing on round 4 join black yarn to any double_crochet chain 2 counts as first single_crochet 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet 5 stitches fasten_off a b count 7 double_crochet to the left and join black a chain 2 counts as single_crochet 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet 5 stitches fasten_off for each eye - with right side facing count one double_crochet to right of where pupil began b join white yarn and chain 2 counts at first single_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet same as where first single_crochet of black is double_crochet in next black single_crochet 2 double_crochet in next 2 black double_crochet double_crochet in next black double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet of 4th round where last single_crochet of black is single_crochet in next double_crochet of 4th round c 10 stitches each eye fasten_off copyright information this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no copies and no forms of distribution are allowed you may not in any form reproduce transmit or distribute this pattern whatsoever this encompasses any part of the pattern itself including but not limited to images diagrams and text without prior written consent of the designer purchasing the pattern does not remove the copyright protection of the pattern you may print out this pattern for your own personal use but you cannot distribute it whether for free or for sale in any form through any venue including but not limited to photocopying other electrical or mechanical means recording or any other information storage and/or retrieval system without prior written consent of the designer you may sell your finished project as long as it is not being mass produced
